sqlMap.select: SELECT e.organization_code AS organizationCode, o.organization_level AS organizationLevel FROM employees e JOIN organizations o ON e.organization_code = o.organization_code WHERE LOWER(e.user_domain) = LOWER(#userDomain#)
SELECT LOWER(e.role_id) AS roleId, INITCAP(r.role_name) AS roleName FROM employee_role e JOIN roles r ON e.role_id = r.role_id WHERE LOWER(e.user_domain) = LOWER(#userDomain#)

SELECT INITCAP(m.menu_name) AS menuName, LOWER(r.role_id) AS roleId, m.task AS task FROM menu m , role_menu r WHERE r.menu_id = m.menu_id AND LOWER(r.role_id) = LOWER(#roleId#) ORDER BY m.menu_name ASC
select first_name || ' ' || last_name from employees WHERE LOWER(user_domain)=LOWER(#userDomain#)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM login WHERE username = #username# AND password = DBMS_OBFUSCATION_TOOLKIT.md5 ( input => UTL_RAW.cast_to_raw (#password#) )
